δ/dz/Tz/Th/ß/Z/Tw/Zw

Z component evident in german:

𐍄𐌰𐌹𐌺𐌽 Zeichen Token
𐍄𐌿𐌲𐌲𐍉 Zunge, tongue
𐍄𐌿𐌽𐌸𐌿𐍃 dent… ZahnTooth…
𐍄𐌹𐌼𐍂𐌾𐌰 tιmrɕa Timbera Zimmerer
𐍄𐍅𐌴𐌹𐍆𐌻 Zweifel doubt
𐍄𐌹𐌲𐌿𐍃 tιgus(ƒ) Zehns! ORTHO ten,decade

D alternative reading
𐍄𐌹𐌲𐌿𐍃 decades !

T in english SZ in german:
𐍅𐌰𐍄𐍉 wethu® vatō® Wasser water

Synthesis: hard δ

w sometimes explicit
